title: Windows update
body: So my computer bugs out the moment were loading in than bam shutting down for update as im spamming cancel nothing works computer shuts off restarts i make it in with a 6 level gap bridged the gap played my hardest and than get crapped on by the system because of one afk in months that wasnt even the whole game so thank you very much non of my friends will play with me in a 20 minute queue for another 20 minute queue to get in game and im super unhappy about it like i didnt deserve to have that happen windows 10 doesnt even register the option to opt out of updates so where in the hell is this my fault and what is going to be done to rectify it!!!

replies.body: I sort of have the same problem. Whenever I load into summoners rift my whole Pc Comply freezes? has been happening since the windows 10 update{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
do you have to restart computer reconnect to game than it works?

its not only me i have 4 or 5 friends i do not have any trace of windows store or anything store related which includes the xbox gamebar and come to find out its not actually windows update this game literally uninstalls my graphics and its like a long load in time to get in the game to have 4 fps to have to restart computer as fast as possible and get a 5 game 20 minute queue im sitting with my friend who ran into the same issue had to reinstall his graphics just to get back in game and its been happening since the latest patch there are no error codes my game literally wont let me play the first match unless my computer is freshly restarted after that its fine and dandy

The most common issue with the Windows update right now is freezing, fps issues, and buzzing noises.  The culprit is the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), which can be disabled for the fix.  If your computer is automatically shutting down then you may have a hardware issue going offline as safety precautions.  If you're still having an issue, let me know some more details like what you're seeing exactly, along with any error messages.  I'm happy to help!
